data.name: SQL_UnitsRepository_GetUnits
data.value: Select v.[ID],un.Code as UnitName,un.Alias as UnitAlias,v.[Name] as VehicleName,v.[Status_ID] as StatusID,s.Code as StatusCode,s.Description as StatusDescription,[Current_Location],[Current_City],[Current_Lat],[Current_Lon],[Destination_Location],[Destination_City],[Destination_Lat],[Destination_Lon],curSta.Name as CurrentStation,curSta.Code as CurrentStationCode,curDiv.DivName as CurrentDivision,homeSta.Code as HomeStationCode,homeSta.Name as HomeStation,homeDiv.DivName as HomeDivision,[OriginalPostStationID],[IsActive],[AVLEnabled],[AVLConnected],[MDTEnabled],[MDCConnected],r.Code as ResourceCode,r.Description as ResourceDescription,[Elapsed_Time] as Time_AtCurrentStatus,[Master_Incident_ID],oos.Description as OOSReason,[Speed],[Heading],[Altitude],[LastAVLUpdate],[RosterScheduleID],[PersonnelCount],v.[AgencyTypeID],[QuickNote],[TemporaryUnit] FROM Vehicle v INNER JOIN Status s on v.Status_ID = s.ID inner join Stations curSta ON v.Post_Station_ID = curSta.ID LEFT join Stations homeSta ON COALESCE(NULLIF(v.OriginalPostStationID,0),v.Post_Station_ID) = homeSta.ID inner Join Resource r on v.PrimaryResource_ID = r.ID inner join Unit_Names un on v.UnitName_ID = un.ID inner Join Division curDiv On v.CurrentDivision_ID = curDiv.ID inner Join Division homeDiv On v.CurrentDivision_ID = homeDiv.ID LEFT JOIN OSReason oos ON v.OSReason_ID = oos.ID

data.name: SQL_UnitsRepository_GetUnitsBase
data.value: Select v.[ID],un.Code as UnitName,un.Alias as UnitAlias,v.[Name] as VehicleName,v.[Status_ID] as StatusID,s.Code as StatusCode,s.Description as StatusDescription,[Current_Location],[Current_City],[Current_Lat],[Current_Lon],[Destination_Location],[Destination_City],[Destination_Lat],[Destination_Lon],curSta.Name as CurrentStation,curSta.Code as CurrentStationCode,curDiv.DivName as CurrentDivision,homeSta.Code as HomeStationCode,homeSta.Name as HomeStation,homeDiv.DivName as HomeDivision,[OriginalPostStationID],[IsActive],[AVLEnabled],[AVLConnected],[MDTEnabled],[MDCConnected],r.Code as ResourceCode,r.Description as ResourceDescription,[Elapsed_Time] as Time_AtCurrentStatus,[Master_Incident_ID],oos.Description as OOSReason,[Speed],[Heading],[Altitude],[LastAVLUpdate],[RosterScheduleID],[PersonnelCount],v.[AgencyTypeID],[QuickNote],[TemporaryUnit] FROM Vehicle v INNER JOIN Status s on v.Status_ID = s.ID inner join Stations curSta ON v.Post_Station_ID = curSta.ID LEFT join Stations homeSta ON COALESCE(NULLIF(v.OriginalPostStationID,0),v.Post_Station_ID) = homeSta.ID inner Join Resource r on v.PrimaryResource_ID = r.ID inner join Unit_Names un on v.UnitName_ID = un.ID inner Join Division curDiv On v.CurrentDivision_ID = curDiv.ID inner Join Division homeDiv On v.CurrentDivision_ID = homeDiv.ID LEFT JOIN OSReason oos ON v.OSReason_ID = oos.ID
